posts.post_title: PSA 4 Polar Bears FT/FS - Willis, Kleinow Boston, Chase Dark, Knight Portrait
posts.post_content:
I have the below 4 Polar Bears, all PSA 4s with no qualifiers, for sale or trade.  Would prefer trade for other PSA 4 or higher Polar Bears but open to other trades or cash.  The prices listed below are firm as they are what I paid and I am not in hurry to move these so don't want to lose any money.  

Willis Throwing - $315
Kleinow Boston - $430
Chase Dark Cap - $200
Knight Portrait - $165

Fred,

I will take Chase

Thanks
are these all gone? sent a PM a couple days ago.  Please advise.  Thanks
